# scrollDirection

**Instance Property**

The axis that the content in the collection view layout scrolls along.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var scrollDirection: UICollectionView.ScrollDirection { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICollectionView/ScrollDirection/vertical].
